header.topics: housing, work, family, neighbourhood, holidays, computing, Edinburgh Festival, football, homework, renting the house.
header.activity: Talking with neighbours and fixing a computer
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, anecdote telling

speaker.occupation: House Keeper and SA in School
